title: astrobiology program faq
content: nasa long history supporting research search life ; nasa first exobiology grant awarded 1959 development wolf trap , instrument detect microbial life surface another planet . field expanded over following decade , broader view search life beyond earth needed , concept astrobiology developed capture wider question concerning habitability . nasa astrobiology institute ( nai ) established 1998 encourage sustain research astrobiology after announcement purported fossil microbe martian meteorite . due effort nai , research astrobiology matured significantly . since , new frontier emerged await exploration astrobiology community , including instrumentation development life detection application artificial intelligence ( ai ) , machine learning , next-generation computing characterization exoplanets . nasa & nbspsmd committed interdisciplinary interdivisional research . nasa helped create planetary science , including exobiology ( 1960s ) , earth system science ( 1970s ) , matured , created hq organization manage mission area . , nasa , main supporter astrobiology research , innovated new way promoting interaction across research program division advance science goal understanding origin discovering life elsewhere described 2015 astrobiology strategy . , nasa astrobiology program announced new programmatic infrastructure . known research coordination network ( rcns ) , first deployed nexus exoplanet system science ( nexss ) , rcns bring together researcher funded variety source interdisciplinary , topically-focused research group . since , nasa astrobiology program activated five rcns , organized around key research topic identified 2015 astrobiology strategy , astrobiology science strategy search life universe , related mission : prebiotic chemistry early earth ; early metabolism , evolution , complexity ; life detection world ; habitable world ( initially focused ocean world ) ; exoplanet system science . structure replaced coordination function nai concluded activity end . addition , astrobiology program solicits interdisciplinary consortium astrobiology research ( icar ) . five year research program involve large geographically-distributed team multi-year interdisciplinary research plan , focused question astrobiology . awardees solicitation join relevant rcn , along awardees smd solicitation ( e.g . , exobiology , habitable world , exoplanet research ) whose research project relevant topic . document contains answer frequently asked question astrobiology program organized topical area :

title: research
content: astrobiology research nasa focus three basic question : how life begin evolve ? life exist elsewhere universe ? future life earth beyond ? over past 50 year , astrobiologists uncovered myriad clue answering big question . contribution many discipline science must integrated answer question . thus , astrobiology program nasa enlists researcher astronomy , chemistry , planetary science , geology , earth science , biology many more discipline . astrobiology understanding how go star stuff life .

title: life , beyond
content: ask most anyone whether life exists planet moon , answer get confident yes ! going back decade ( many way generation ) , introduced menagerie extraterrestrial good bad . presence suffuses entertainment culture , human seem almost innate belief-or hope-that not alone universe . extraterrestrial presence regular display , course , fiction . no life beyond earth ever found ; no evidence alien life ever visited planet . story .

title: astrobiology strategy
content: nasa astrobiology town hall : nasa decadal astrobiology research & exploration strategynovember , , 1pm et interactive nasa astrobiology town hall held november , , provide overview forthcoming nasa decadal astrobiology research exploration strategy ( nasa-dares ) . new strategy aim address evolving need astrobiology community , reflecting growth increasing interdisciplinarity . click more information . click submit question advance . astrobiology research sponsored nasa focus three basic question : how life begin evolve ? life exist elsewhere universe ? how search life universe ? over past 50 year , astrobiologists uncovered myriad clue answering big question . since astrobiology community published last astrobiology roadmap , research field focused more more link between astro bio astrobiology , make planetary body habitable . habitability become major buzzword astrobiology researcher learned more extraterrestrial environment solar system beyond deepened understanding how when early earth became habitable . why earth habitable ? how , when , why become habitable ? , , body solar system habitable ? might planet orbiting star habitable ? sort star most likely habitable planet ? few question astrobiologists trying answer today . preparing new science strategy , hundred member astrobiology community collaborated intensive process defining goal objective astrobiology research moving forward . community identified six major topic research field today : 2015 astrobiology strategy identifies question guide inspire astrobiology research topic lab , field , experiment flown planetary science mission over next decade . strategy also identifies major ongoing challenge astrobiologists tackle attempt answer universal question . download 2015 astrobiology strategy .

title: life extreme

title: seti allen telescope array ( ata )
content: allen telescope array ? allen telescope array ( ata ) located hat creek observatory cascade mountain california , approximately 300 mile north san francisco two dozen mile north lassen peak . comprises array 42 antenna , 6 meter diameter , simultaneously used seti cutting-edge radio astronomy research . ata currently upgraded more sensitive receiver . not world largest antenna array , advantage able examine large swath sky , over wide range frequency approximately 14 ghz . unlike instrument mostly used radio astronomy project , ata devote large amount time seti search . allen telescope array observed ? several observing project allen telescope array . one reconnaissance star system found planet ( planet candidate ) nasa kepler mission , especially planet so-called habitable zone . kepler uncovered thousand candidate planet since launch , world make routine appearance observing list ata . addition , ata observed small region vicinity milky way galactic center . region highest stellar density galaxy , conceivable truly advanced society might place beacon . third effort ata observe nearby , so-called hab star . stellar system less ,000 light-year distant characteristic would make suitable host ( habitable ) planet life . last project extension project phoenix , seti institute effort ran , used radio telescope australia , west virginia , puerto rico scrutinize one thousand nearby star system hunt radio signal . ata project included effort detect radio signal coming object oumuamua , direction wow signal , uncovered 1977 ( defunct ) big ear radio telescope ohio state university . , new improved receiver garner better sensitivity wider frequency range ata under construction . several new seti observing program take advantage new hardware formulated . -seth shostak , updated : july .

title: total eclipse moon coming america night march -
content: total eclipse moon visible everyone north south america night march 13 , . ( march 14th often celebrated pi day also einstein birthday ! ) total eclipse moon very democratic -- perfectly safe look not requiring special equipment see . unfortunate thing many part country see eclipse middle night might lead very tired co-worker student coming next morning . full information sheet , written astronomer andrew fraknoi , eclipse time time zone , found : special note : eclipse moon earth seen eclipse sun ( earth ) moon . normally , no one moon see eclipse . !
